casebody.data:
NORTH CAROLINA STATE BOARD OF EDUCATION
v.
The STATE of North Carolina and The North Carolina Rules Review Commission No. 110PA16-2 Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 15, 2017 Christopher G. Browning, Jr., Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for The North Carolina Rules Review Commission. Amar Majmundar, Special Deputy Attorney General, Olga, Vysotskaya de Brito, Assistant Attorney General, for The State of North Carolina. Robert F. Orr, Attorney at Law, Asheville, Andrew H. Erteschik, Attorney at Law, Saad Gul, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, John Michael Durnovich, Attorney at Law, for North Carolina State Board of Education.

ORDER

This Court will hear oral arguments in this case during the February 2018 calendar. On its own motion, this Court sets the following briefing schedule: The Appellant's brief will be due on 22 December 2017. The Appellees' brief will be due on 16 January 2018. Should Appellant wish to file a reply brief, the reply brief will be due on 22 January 2018.

By order of the Court in Conference, this 15 th day of December , 2017.
